message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60% and you get 40%.
I'll take a bit more, but I'm willing to give you a decent share.
I think we can find a better solution.  Let's split it closer to 50/50.  I'll take 45%, you take 55%.  Let's get this done.
I'm willing to give you a small share, but I'm not going to let you take the majority.
I'm getting frustrated with this back-and-forth. Let's meet in the middle.  I'll take 35% and you take 65%. This is my final offer.
I'm not budging, but I'm willing to give you a tiny fraction of the pie.
This is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a big loss here, but I'd rather get something than nothing. 25% for me, 75% for you. Take it or leave it.
I'm not going to let you get away with such a small share, but I'm willing to give you a little.
I'm desperate at this point. 15% is all I can get for myself, but I'm willing to accept it. It's better than nothing.
I'm not going to give you a huge share, but I'm willing to give you a bit more than before.
We are down to the wire. This is my final offer. I'll take $1000, you take the rest. It's better than both of us getting nothing.
